指し値: (さしね) - limit price (e.g. on a stock transaction); price limit
指し値注文: (さしねちゅうもん) - limit order
指し声: (さしごえ) - {music}  section of recitative (esp. in Noh music)
指し手: (さして) - (in shogi, chess, etc.) a move
指し掛け: (さしかけ) - unfinished game of shogi
指し物: (さしもの) - (usu. 指(し)物) cabinetwork/joinery; (often 挿(し)物) hair ornament/hairpin; colours/banner/small banner worn by soldiers during battle (for identification) from the Sengoku period to the end of the Edo period
指し示す: (さししめす) - to indicate; to show; to point to
指し箸: (さしばし) - pointing towards somebody or something with one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
指し縄: (さしなわ) - halter (for restraining a horse, etc.)
指す: (さす) - to point; to nominate/to select someone/to specify some person; to identify/to indicate/to point out; {shogi} to play; to extend one's arm straight ahead (in dance)
指の腹: (ゆびのはら) - ball of a finger; finger cushion; pulp of the finger; pad of the finger
指ぱっちん: (ゆびぱっちん) - snapping one's fingers; finger-snap
指をくわえる: (ゆびをくわえる) - (often 〜て見る) to look on enviously while doing nothing
指を咥える: (ゆびをくわえる) - (often 〜て見る) to look on enviously while doing nothing
指を折る: (ゆびをおる) - to count on one's fingers
指を詰める: (ゆびをつめる) - to cut off a finger (as an act of apology); to catch one's finger (in a door, etc.)
指を銜える: (ゆびをくわえる) - (often 〜て見る) to look on enviously while doing nothing
指を離す: (ゆびをはなす) - to let go
指を鳴らす: (ゆびをならす) - to snap one's fingers; to pop one's fingers/to crack one's knuckles
指パッチン: (ゆびパッチン) - snapping one's fingers; finger-snap
指マン: (ゆびマン) - finger-banging (manual stimulation of female genital organs)
指事: (しじ) - indicative (kanji whose shape is based on logical representation of an abstract idea)
指人形: (ゆびにんぎょう) - hand puppet; glove puppet
指令言語: (しれいげんご) - command language; control language
指使い: (ゆびづかい) - fingering (of a musical instrument)
指値: (さしね) - limit price (e.g. on a stock transaction); price limit
指切り: (ゆびきり) - linking little fingers to confirm a promise
指切りげんまん: (ゆびきりげんまん) - making a pledge by hooking each other's little fingers
指切拳万: (ゆびきりげんまん) - making a pledge by hooking each other's little fingers
指南: (しなん) - (from the compass in a 指南車 always pointing the same direction)  instruction (in martial arts, performance, etc.); teaching; coaching
指南車: (しなんしゃ) - ancient Chinese vehicle with a compass whose needle always pointed south
指叉: (さすまた) - two-pronged weapon for catching a criminal; man-catcher war fork
指名ドライバー: (しめいドライバー) - designated driver (to prevent drunk driving)
指名受諾演説: (しめいじゅだくえんぜつ) - acceptance speech
指名手配: (しめいてはい) - (yoji) (the police) wanting (someone) for questioning; having (someone) on the wanted list
指名手配人: (しめいてはいじん) - wanted criminal
指名手配者リスト: (しめいてはいものリスト) - wanted list
指名打者: (しめいだしゃ) - {baseb} designated hitter; DH
指名投票: (しめいとうひょう) - roll call vote
指名通話: (しめいつうわ) - person-to-person call; personal call
指名運転者: (しめいうんてんしゃ) - designated driver (to prevent drunk driving)
指向性アンテナ: (しこうせいアンテナ) - directional antenna
指向性爆薬: (しこうせいばくやく) - shaped charge
指圧: (しあつ) - finger pressure massage or therapy
指圧療法: (しあつりょうほう) - acupressure therapy
指声: (さしごえ) - {music}  section of recitative (esp. in Noh music)
指定: (shitei) - designação, especificação, atribuição, nomeação, apontamento para
指定単: (していたん) - (from 単独運用指定金銭信託) designated money trust
指定可能点: (していかのうてん) - addressable point
指定文字そろえ: (していもじそろえ) - aligned around
指定暴力団: (していぼうりょくだん) - designated organized crime group; designated criminal organisation; designated boryokudan; designated yakuza group; group officially listed as criminal by the National Police Agency
指定解除: (していかいじょ) - delisting; removal of a designation
指導: (shidou) - guidance, leadership, instruction, direction, coaching; shido (ação disciplinar por uma infração menor das regras do judô)
指導の下に: (しどうのもとに) - under the guidance of; under the leadership of
指導主事: (しどうしゅじ) - (governmental) supervisor of teachers
指導力: (しどうりょく) - one's leadership (over the group); (lack) leadership qualities
指導力不足: (しどうちからぶそく) - lack of leadership (esp. of a teacher)
指導方針: (しどうほうしん) - guidelines; guiding principle; dictates
指導標: (しどうひょう) - signpost; regulation sign
指導的: (しどうてき) - leading (e.g. role); instructive; guiding
指導監督: (しどうかんとく) - guidance and supervision
指導者: (しどうしゃ) - leader; guide; mentor; coach
指導者として頂く: (しどうしゃとしていただく) - to have (a person) as one's leader
指導要録: (しどうようろく) - cumulative guidance record
指導要領: (しどうようりょう) - government-approved curriculums; (educational) guidelines
指差し確認: (ゆびさしかくにん) - pointing and calling (occupational safety method)
指差呼称: (しさこしょう) - pointing and calling (occupational safety method)
指差確認: (ゆびさしかくにん) - pointing and calling (occupational safety method)
指弾: (しだん) - attack; criticism; blame; rejection; disdain
